channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: NLP: The Key To Responsible And Practical AI Deployment In Business
item.description: NLP isn’t going anywhere and will likely become one of the cornerstones of a company's AI philosophy and plan.

item.title: What Is CrowdStrike? Security Company Implicated In Online Outage
item.description: An issue with CrowdStrike's cybersecurity platform may have caused the mass outage affecting companies around the world.

item.title: Digital ESG Strategies: The Future Of Corporate Sustainability
item.description: From a management perspective, digital tools provide clearer, data-driven insights that facilitate informed decision-making and strategic planning.

item.title: Is There A Link Between Extreme Urban Heat And Climate Change?
item.description: What's making our cities so hot? Is climate change behind this trend or something else?
